contest-event.event-date:
June 16, 2019 D Hebden Bridge March & Hymn Contest
Hebden Bridge March Contest 1 March Contest Hebden Bridge March and Hymn Tune Contest hebden-bridge-march-contest
March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire 1st over all - £500 and Alan Bottomley Memorial Shield: Milnrow 2nd - £250: Elland Silver 3rd - £125: Marsden Silver Best Hymn - £50: Elland Silver
Sections (not in Main Prizes) - all £125: Best 1st Section: Weston Silver Band Best 2nd: Slaithwaite Best 3rd: Uppermill Best 4th: Dobcross Silver Best Youth: Elland Silver Youth
Best Youth Instrumentalist: Lewis Barton - Elland Silver Youth Best Street March - £25: Weston Silver Band Best Deportment - £25: Marsden Silver
July 15, 2019, 1:02 p.m. Jan. 6, 2020, 6:42 p.m.
